actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to authorize the Director of the Bureau of Mines to extend certain assistance to certain individuals engaged in mineral exploration and development.

summary.text: Authorizes the Director of the Bureau of Mines to establish and carry out a program of financial and other assistance to small, independent operators engaged in mineral exploration and development.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Director of the Bureau of Mines to extend certain assistance to certain individuals engaged in mineral exploration and development.
